QuestData.Title: The Shoe Is On The Other Foot
QuestData.Description: I loathe sprites! One time, one of those nasty buggers followed me all day, putting dirt in my tea and bugs in my hair.$B$BI mean, who does that!?$B$BWell, I think it's time for a little payback. Do you know what the sprites up at Windward Isle love more than anything in the world?$B$BYeah, you guessed it. Shoes!$B$BAnd we're going to steal them. Won't that make them mad! Hah!$B$BWell, I'm scared to go near sprites, so you'll have to do it, $n.
